Really cool and fun game to play. Even more fun with friends. If you dont have prime expect some cheaters but overall i think its a good game but sh*t support. Accidentally turned my steam mobile authenticator off and then turned it back on and now i cant do anything on the steam market. I would've made so much profit but now i cant and i need to wait 15 days. Ruined my whole week of no school. Overall i would recommend 10/10! but please add something if you accidentally turned off you mobile authenticator so you can confirm something or do anything to have access to the market and not need to wait 15 days...
